
#### Aim of prog: Understand section 2.3.1, p. 35

#### Clear memory and load packages
rm(list = ls())
graphics.off()

# library(data.table)

#### 
gammaMatrix = matrix(data = c(1/2, 1/2, 1/4, 3/4), nrow = 2, byrow = TRUE)

if (unique(rowSums(gammaMatrix)) != 1)
	warning("The sum of Γ's columns should be 1!")

## Stationnary distribution
delta = 1/3*c(1, 2)

# Check sum is one
sum(delta)

# Check it is stationnary, δ * Γ == δ? Watch out between col vectors and row vectors! Use transpose
t(delta) %*% gammaMatrix - t(delta)
t(gammaMatrix) %*% delta == delta
